prompt_requests.rationale: Rationale: Provide a rationale on how you want to use your turn to reach the game objective.
prompt_requests.action: Action: What you want to do?
prompt_requests.action_move: Direction: If your action is to move, where you want to move?
prompt_requests.action_broadcast: Message: If your action is broadcast, what you want to broadcast?
prompt_requests.memory_update: Memory: Summarize everything worth remembering. Pretend that you lose all your previous memory and only have this memory after your turn.
prompt_requests.planning_checklist:
During Planning: If DRONE_ID==1, PROPOSE. If DRONE_ID>1, ACCEPT or COUNTER. Broadcast exactly: 'PLAN: ...
REGION: type=row, y=[YMIN..YMAX]
PATH: ...
RENDEZVOUS: (x,y) at round R'.
prompt_requests.non_overlap_hint: Execution hint: Prefer moves that keep you inside your declared REGION while it has unknown figures.
